sentences: Elizabeth Drake is an Australian composer.
Her film soundtrack credits include Road to Nhill and Japanese Story
1997 AACTA Award for Best Original Music Score for Road to Nhill
2003 AACTA Award for Best Original Music Score for Japanese Story
2004 ARIA Award for Best Original Soundtrack, Cast or Show Album for Japanese Story
